Understate: The claim may understate the impact of the proposed elimination of the birth cost recovery program on child support.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to conclusively prove that child support is being cut.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the elimination of the birth cost recovery program is equivalent to cutting child support, which may be a problematic assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations for the proposed elimination of the birth cost recovery program that do not necessarily involve cutting child support.
